p: The contact person of specimen is Chen Feng ( fengchen0215@scbg.ac.cn). The raw sequencing data of M. cajuputi subsp. cumingiana have been deposited in the NCBI Sequence Read Archive under accession numbers PRJNA674705. The chloroplast genome of the M. cajuputi subsp. cumingiana was submitted to GenBank under accession number: MT731621. Treefile of 18 species and genes for phylogenetic analysis were deposited at Figshare: https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.13194128.v1.
